entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update src/Security/samples/CustomPolicyProvider sample from .NET 2, to .NET 9 #61462
  • Perf improvement: https, json #61459
  • Declarative state persistence base case failure #61456
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder() is getting stuck randomly. #61450
  • Forwarded Headers Middleware: X-Forwarded-Prefix Applied when it comes from an Unknown Proxy #61449
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61446
  • Perf regression: json, kestrel-encoded-url, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61445
  • Perf improvement: single_query, single_query #61444
  • Worried about comment and directon of aspnet mvc vs blazor #61443
  • RazorSourceGenerator fails with net10.0 Preview 3 #61439

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server - `Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation.set_Tags` on .NET 10 preview 3 #61460
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61415
  • Update src/Security/samples/CustomPolicyProvider sample from .NET 2, to .NET 9 #61461
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` broken on `10.0.0-preview.2.25164.1` and `10.0.0-preview.3.25172.1` - readonly properties and missing 'Reference' definition #61457
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json_middleware, kestrel-header-symbols #61420
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols #61430

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IOpenApiDocumentProvider interface and implementation #61463
    area-mvc, area-minimal
  • Use NormalizeDirectory consistently in SiteExtensions D.B.P #61455
    area-networking
  • Enable getting IJSObjectReference to a JS function in Blazor interop #61453
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 0c0caeb605f7b2b99408bfa6b18b13526d747727 to e80f44b15b3050d868dc8fb58d0fa514ca8c7451 #61452
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `e90fe24` #61451
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add preload placeholder to blazorwasm template #61448
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Quarantine: Copy_MultipleSegments #61294
    area-middleware, 10.0-preview4
  • Remove unnecessary newline at the end of the webapiaot csproj #61302
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview4
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation` failing tests #61427
    test-failure, area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Increase Grpc InteropTests timeout again, and quarantine EmptyUnary #61433
    area-grpc, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fix for Kestrel's ParseHeaders throwing ArgumentOutOfRange exception #61316
    community-contribution, area-networking
